flexibility_control.description: Limits for interactive demand shifting in Flexibility Control chart. max_reduction_pct: max % of avg-hour energy removable from one bar. max_addition_pct: max % of predicted value addable to a receiving hour. window_hours: time window for redistribution. split_before_after: ratio of removed energy sent to hours before vs after.
